item.description:
This Basics Drum Class is for people who want to learn how to play a djembe, askiko or conga drum and how to follow and make rhythm.

I this session, I will teach you in a fun way, what you need to know.

YOU MUST, bring a folding chair - We recommend a full height folding chair (like and office chair, with a back. 9.99 at Target.

Cost: $10 for all participants. PLEASE note the time change to 6:30PM start so we will be able to go for 1.5 hours.

See you at the river!

If you want to reach me directly now or on Saturday call, 617-686-6080 Alan'd cell.

Also, drum circle at The Shop - FRIDAY at 7PM. Tonight!

Love and happiness.

Alan
item.how_to_find_us: Come to the Publick Theater Parking Lot - NEW start time. 6:30 - 8PM
item.name: Basis Class
